itemizedlist.listitem: This example uses the Virtuoso SOAP client for testing a SOAP interop IV endpoints.
At least 2 web threads are needed, so this should be noted before starting. An Error message is shown if only one is available.
This page shows operations defined for SOAP Interop Round IV tests, grouped by encoding and test group name.
The demo pages are SOAP clients defined to perform appropriate SOAP call.
The VSP based clients make a specific form for entering the input data and selecting an endpoint to test.
Once call is made (invoked with Call button), the results will be extracted from SOAP response and shown.
Also the request and response wire dumps will be shown for debugging purposes.
